0.text: Bug 17227  [Dialogs] ElementTreeSelectionDialog should handle double click.

1.text: Using Eclipse 2.0, Build F1 (buildid: 20020521)  on Windows 2000.

2.text: NOTE: Make sure you have a few java projects in your workspace (I just imported  a bunch).

3.text: From the Java perspective, go to Search, "Customize..", add NLS Keys.

4.text: Now open the NLS Keys Tab and click on the second "Browse" button (for Property  file name).

5.text: You'll notice that the dialog title is "Pr&operties File Selection".

6.text: Could you  please remove that ampersand '&'?

7.text: Also, in this same dialog, clicking on the "+" will expand the project folders,  but double clicking will not (and it should).

8.text: I should also mention that this  dialog has a maximize icon enabled, and it is resizable.

9.text: This is unlike all  other dialogs, and I'll let you decide whether or not this is important.
